tapWheelEffect(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.server.controller.ToolCardEffect
method responsible of the effect of moving up to two dice,depending on the chose of the player, in the pattern box list that match the color of a dice in the round tracker
TapWheelEvent - Class in it.polimi.se2018.events.clientserver
Class TapWheelEvent: client server event for Tap Wheel tool card
TapWheelEvent(int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.events.clientserver.TapWheelEvent
class constructor with the number of the dice the player wants to move, the index where to take the first dice and where to move it and index where to take the second dice and where to move it

ToolCardController - Class in it.polimi.se2018.server.controller
Class ToolCardController: the class represents the controller of the tool card effect, decide which effect to call depending on the the runtime event received from the notification of the virtual view e let the effect do the rest, and decide which request send to the player depending on the tool card the player decide to use.
